name: Ricetta: Cinque tesori marinati
desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making Five Pickled Treasures.

value.name: Ravanello
value.desc: Rich in fiber and nutrients. Easy to grow and harvest.

value.name: Melonlavanda
value.desc: Un frutto dal colore vivace. Se cucinata, la sua polpa si trasforma in pietanze dal sapore unico per il palato.

value.name: Carota
value.desc: A healthy and nutritious vegetable that is crunchy and sweet to the taste. Easy to grow and harvest.

value.name: Alga
value.desc: A plant that grows in shallow seas. It adds a unique flavor to dishes.

value.name: Cinque tesori marinati
value.desc: Pickled vegetables. A round of fermentation makes food richer and also allows it to keep for longer. There were originally only four "treasures," but for auspiciousness' sake, the four vegetables were mixed and plated up with one additional "treasure" added in, hence the name "Five Pickled Treasures."

value.text: <color=#ffffffd9>Purchase from Shimura Kanbei at Shimura's Restaurant</color>
